Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the attestation type of an AttestationCredential struct.
        """
kwargs = {'attestation_type': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Attestation type must be an AttestationType enumeration.', objects.
    AttestationCredential, **kwargs)
credential = objects.AttestationCredential()
args = credential, 'attestation_type', 0
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Attestation type must be an AttestationType enumeration.', setattr, *args)
